channel.title: Not accepting global.scar
channel.description:
when i do type this: [code]program New; {.include SRL/SRL.Scar} {.include SRL/SRL/core.Scar} begin
end.code]
i get this debug error: [code] Include file C:\Documents and Settings\Armando\My Documents\Scott\Script Based Cheats\SRL WITH GUIDE\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/core.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling[/code]
any help? [/code]

begin
